title: Crude oil export destination countries of the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2016 to 2018
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 3 lines denoting 2016, 2017, and 2018. The y axis indicates the Export volume in thousand metric tons and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall 2016, 2017, and 2018 are roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The lines ordered according to average values of Export volume in thousand metric tons in descending order is: 1. 2018, 2. 2016, and lastly, 3. 2017.
Overall across the Year, 2018 mostly maintained the highest Export volume in thousand metric tons when compared to others with a mean value of 2161.14, and it peaked at Netherlands.
After 2018, 2016 overall has the second highest values , with a mean value of 2098.9, peaking at UK_refineries.
The botommost line, 2017,  has a mean of 2003.48, and peaked at Netherlands.
yAxis: Export volume in thousand metric tons
min_summary: The given chart is of multi-line type with 3 lines namely 2016, 2017, and 2018. The y axis represents Export volume in thousand metric tons and the x axis represents Year.
Overall 2016, 2017, and 2018 are roughly constant,  throughout the Year

Throughout the period, 2018 generally had the highest Export volume in thousand metric tons relative to others with an average of 2161.14, and it reached its maximum at Netherlands with a value of 16797.0.
After 2018, 2016 overall has the second highest values , with a mean value of 2098.9, peaking at UK_refineries.
2017 mostly had the least Export volume in thousand metric tons with a mean value of 2003.48, which peaked at Netherlands with a value of 13980.0.
